fields.title: Azul: Summer Pavillion
fields.description: Players collect sets of similarly coloured tiles to place on their board, trying to create sets of tiles to score points.

fields.title: Bananagrams
fields.description: Players try and connect individual letter tiles to try and form connected words in the quickest amount of time.

fields.title: Captain Sonar
fields.description: Two teams take control of submarines, using map controls and weapon systems to root out and destroy the opposing sub.

fields.title: Diamant
fields.description: Players assume the role of adventurers looking for treasure in a diamond mine, pushing ever deeper into the cave and weighing up the risks vs the rewards.

fields.title: CDSK
fields.description: Players go around a board answering trivia questions, betting their level of knowledge on a chosen subject to try and move around quicker than opponents to get to the finish line.
